name: Super Vadimka
storyline: In this you need to collect the keys for the endings of some bad and good to get enemies to throw and reach the boss to shoot a fish and walk in winter this aigra was created by 1 developer making a series of computer games for this you need to reach Dr. kulechka he was too howling to create an army of robot enemies to attack Vadim Kulev.
summary: Super Vadimka is a free hardcore platformer that delves into survival horror, created by VadimBallzGames for Windows. Originally released on October 20, 2021, the game was met with a variety of bugs that hindered the gameplay experience. A revised version launched on March 29, 2022, aimed to address some of these issues, yet some players still expressed dissatisfaction with the fixes. As the inaugural chapter in the Super Vadimka series, it challenges players with its unforgiving difficulty, where the protagonist can perish from a single hit. Nevertheless, players can utilize save features with the F5 and F6 keys to manage their progress throughout the game.
